## Date

## Participants

List meeting participants using their @ mention names

-
- @ mention a person to add them as an attendee and they will be notified.

## Goals

List goals for this meeting (e.g., Set design priorities for FY19)

-

|  |  |  | Add notes for each discussion topic |

## Decisions

Type /decision to record the decisions you make in this meeting:

> Info: To delete one of the sample pages, open the ··· menu and select Delete.

Shared with your team. Learn about [space permissions](https://confluence.atlassian.com/confcloud/assign-space-permissions-724764762.html) and [restrictions](https://confluence.atlassian.com/confcloud/add-or-remove-page-restrictions-724764891.html).

## Greetings!

Think of your personal space as a folder of storing all the documents that don't currently belong anywhere else. It's all yours. Customize this page by clicking the edit button ![image](https://confluence.atlassian.com/images/icons/edit_pencil.png) on top.

## What's inside this space?

[Örnek Sayfalar](/wiki/spaces/~5b1a76fe6c27b84d00ceb840/pages/3430809833)

- Toplantı notları
- Karar
- Ürün gereklilikleri

> Info: Bu sayfayı düzenlemek için  bağlantısına tıklayın. Silmek için ··· menüsünü açın ve Sil seçeneğini belirleyin.

StatusNot started / YellowIn progress / GreenCompleteImpactRedHigh / YellowMedium / GreenLowDriver@ mention driverApprover@ approverContributors@ contributorsInformed@ stakeholdersDue dateType // to add a dateResourcesType /link to add links to relevant research, pages, and related decisions
## Relevant data

Add any data or feedback the team should consider when making this decision.

## Background

Provide context on a decision the team needs to make and include information about constraints and challenges.

## Options considered

|  | Option 1 | Option 2 |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Description |  |  |
| Pros and cons |  |  |
| Estimated cost |  |  |

## Action items

Add action items to close the loop on open questions or concerns.

1
incomplete
Type your task here. Use "@" to assign a user and "//" to select a due date.

## Outcome

Summarize the outcome.

> Info: Bu sayfayı düzenlemek için  bağlantısına tıklayın. Silmek için ··· menüsünü açın ve Sil seçeneğini belirleyin.

Target releaseType // to add a target release dateEpicType /Jira to add Jira epics and issuesDocument statusDRAFTDocument owner@ mention ownerDesigner@ designerTech lead@ leadTechnical writers@ writersQA
## Objective

Provide context on this project and explain how it fits into your organization's strategic goals.

## Success metrics

List project goals and the metrics you'll use to judge its success.

| Goal | Metric |
| --- | --- |
| e.g., Simplify the user experience | e.g., Customer satisfaction score increases |
|  |  |

## Assumptions

List any assumptions you have about your users, technical constraints, or business goals.

## Milestones

Type /planner to create a visual roadmap and help your team stay on track. To edit workstreams or dates, select the placeholder and tap the pencil icon.

ur team stay on track. To edit workstreams or dates, select the placeholder and tap the pencil icon.

Type /trello to add a card or board to this page or /jira to include a Jira issue, chart, or project.

## Requirements

| Requirement | User Story | Importance | Jira Issue | Notes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| e.g., Must be mobile responsive | e.g., John is a PM who wants to check on his team's progress from the train station |  |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |  |

## User interaction and design

Type /image to add mockups, diagrams, and screenshots related to the requirements.

## Open Questions

| Question | Answer | Date Answered |
| --- | --- | --- |
| e.g., How might we make users more aware of this feature? | e.g., We'll announce the feature with a blog post and a presentation | Type // to add a date |

## Out of Scope

List the features discussed which are out of scope or might be revisited in a later release.

-

| Driver |  |
| --- | --- |
| Approver | @ approver |
| Contributors | @ contributors |
| Informed | @ stakeholders |
| Objective | Seasonality module is one of our most complicated modules. It handles lots of steps within one module and we believe splitting it into different modules will be much more effective. |
| Due date |  |
| Key outcomes | Create data prep module in Rocks (aggregating promo should be done via current promo modules)Create depromo moduleCreate calculate coefficients moduleCreate smart selection moduleSimplify the seasonality module by removing unused capabilitiesCapability to fill missing special day effectsCreate a new dag for seasonality training |
| Status | /  / |

## Problem Statement

Seasonality module is highly complicated right now. If we can control our output in each step, it will be much more easier to configure. Users will gain more control and monitoring; it would be easier to modify the. Also this will pave way for partial update mechanism.

monitoring; it would be easier to modify the. Also this will pave way for partial update mechanism.

## Scope

| Must have: | New modules for data prep, depromo, coefficient calculation, smart selectionCreate new seasonality dagRemove unused capabilitiesBetter handling of promo multipliers, fill from above if missingGuides for each module |
| --- | --- |
| Nice to have: | Try different data handling methods for run time concerns.Add more configuration options for Prophet (regressor + holiday/promo difference) |
| Not in scope: | Partial update capability |

## Timeline

Type /planner to create a visual roadmap and help your team stay on track. To edit workstreams or dates, select the placeholder below and tap the pencil icon.

Type /trello to add a card or board to this page or /jira to include a Jira issue, chart, or project.
